title: As we talk we learn (TEFC)
creator_credit: Malcolm Smith, South Australian Film Corporation and Brian Bergin
brief_description: Language, specifically talking, is a valuable, perhaps essential element in processes of learning. This film looks at communication between teacher and pupil is necessary in order to maximize the learning process. Various kinds of classroom talking are illustrated in order to determine which is the most effective technique for learning.
